TypeSignature.Value: public interface IReadOnlyList<out T> : System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<out T>, System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection<out T>

.class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadOnlyList`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a read-only collection of elements that can be accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IReadOnlyList(T) represents a list in which the number and order of list elements is read-only. The content of list elements is not guaranteed to be read-only.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the element to get.
Docs.summary: Gets the element at the specified index in the read-only list.
Docs.value: The element at the specified index in the read-only list.
